name: 🌋 FlareScape!
description:
POTENTIAL EPILEPSY WARNING! 🌋 Solar flares incoming - evacuate immediately!! 🌋 About

You are an astronaut in you ATV on a moon base somewhere in space. Unfortunately, the orbit of the moon became unstable and the new orbit caused massive solar flares to happen every 10 seconds. You have to grab batteries from pickup points and get them to the bunker pronto, otherwise you're all crisp! 

🌋 How To Play

- WSAD / Arrows - control ATV

- Collect Green batteries at Green pickup points

- Deposit batteries at Blue bunker on top of the map - Rince-repeat 4 times

- Feeling lost? Pylons lead the way!

- IMMEDIATE SOLAR FLARE WARNING - SEEK IMMEDIATE SHELTER IN SHADOWS

🌋 Technologies used

- Engine: Unity + Unity Atoms

- Models / Colors: Unity ProBuilder

- IDE: IntelliJ Rider

I wish one day I can fullfill my dream and make an Audio on my Compo entries :joy:
